**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is. Include relevant outputs (e.g. stack traces, logs).

**To Reproduce**
Commands to reproduce the behavior. Include all required input assets.

 - Revision: [`git rev-parse HEAD`]

 - Hardware: [e.g. DGX H100]
 - CUDA Version: [e.g. 12.8]
